document.full_text: florida lawmakers on thursday sent a pair of abortion bills to governor rick scott as the republican-led legislature weighed into socially conservative issues that have been simmering for years.
document.title: florida set to enact new abortion restrictions
lines_and_colors: florida lawmakers on thursday sent a pair of abortion bills to governor rick scott as the republican-led legislature weighed into socially conservative issues that have been simmering for years.
